001package org.nasdanika.exec.gen.resources;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.concurrent.CancellationException;
007
008import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
009import org.nasdanika.common.BiSupplier;
010import org.nasdanika.common.Consumer;
011import org.nasdanika.common.ConsumerFactory;
012import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
013import org.nasdanika.common.ExecutionException;
014import org.nasdanika.common.FunctionFactory;
015import org.nasdanika.common.ListCompoundSupplierFactory;
016import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
017import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
018import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
019import org.nasdanika.emf.EObjectAdaptable;
020import org.nasdanika.exec.resources.File;
021import org.nasdanika.persistence.ConfigurationException;
022import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked;
023import org.nasdanika.resources.BinaryEntity;
024import org.nasdanika.resources.BinaryEntityContainer;
025import org.nasdanika.resources.Merger;
026
027public class FileConsumerFactoryAdapter extends ResourceConsumerFactoryAdapter<File> {
028
029        public FileConsumerFactoryAdapter(File file) {
030                super(file);
031        }
032        
033        @Override
034        public boolean isAdapterForType(Object type) {
035                return type == ConsumerFactory.class;
036        }
037        
038        protected SupplierFactory<InputStream> getContentsFactory() {
039                ListCompoundSupplierFactory<InputStream> contentsFactory = new ListCompoundSupplierFactory<>("Contents");
040                for (EObject ce: ((File) getTarget()).getContents()) {
041                        contentsFactory.add(Objects.requireNonNull(EObjectAdaptable.adaptToSupplierFactory(ce, InputStream.class), "Cannot adapt to SupplierFactory: " + ce));
042                }
043                return contentsFactory.then(Util.JOIN_STREAMS_FACTORY);
044        }
045                
046        private ConsumerFactory<BiSupplier<BinaryEntityContainer, InputStream>> createFileFactory() {
047                File semanticElement = (File) getTarget();
048                
049                return context -> new Consumer<BiSupplier<BinaryEntityContainer, InputStream>>() {
050
051                        private String finalName = finalName(context.interpolateToString(semanticElement.getName()));
052                
053                        @Override
054                        public double size() {
055                                return 1;
056                        }
057        
058                        @Override
059                        public String name() {
060                                return "Create file " + finalName;
061                        }
062        
063                        @Override
064                        public void execute(BiSupplier<BinaryEntityContainer, InputStream> input, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
065                                if (!progressMonitor.isCancelled()) {
066                                        switch (semanticElement.getReconcileAction()) {
067                                        case CANCEL:
068                                                if (input.getFirst().find(finalName, progressMonitor) != null) {
069                                                        throw new CancellationException("Cancelling generation - resource '" + finalName + "' already exists in " + input.getFirst());
070                                                }
071                                        case OVERWRITE: {
072                                                BinaryEntity file = Objects.requireNonNull(input.getFirst().get(finalName, progressMonitor), "Cannot create file " + finalName + " in " + input.getFirst());
073                                                if (input.getSecond() != null) {
074                                                        file.setState(input.getSecond(), progressMonitor);
075                                                }
076                                                break;
077                                        }
078                                        case KEEP: {
079                                                if (input.getFirst().find(finalName, progressMonitor) == null) {
080                                                        BinaryEntity file = Objects.requireNonNull(input.getFirst().get(finalName, progressMonitor), "Cannot create file " + finalName + " in " + input.getFirst());
081                                                        if (input.getSecond() != null) {
082                                                                file.setState(input.getSecond(), progressMonitor);
083                                                        }
084                                                }
085                                                break;
086                                        }
087                                        case APPEND: {
088                                                BinaryEntity file = Objects.requireNonNull(input.getFirst().get(finalName, progressMonitor), "Cannot create file " + finalName + " in " + input.getFirst());
089                                                if (input.getSecond() != null) {
090                                                        try {
091                                                                file.setState(file.exists(progressMonitor) ? Util.join(file.getState(progressMonitor), input.getSecond()) : input.getSecond(), progressMonitor);
092                                                        } catch (IOException e) {
093                                                                throw new ExecutionException(e, this);
094                                                        }
095                                                }
096                                                break;
097                                        }                                                       
098                                        case MERGE: {
099                                                BinaryEntity file = Objects.requireNonNull(input.getFirst().get(finalName, progressMonitor), "Cannot create file " + finalName + " in " + input.getFirst());
100                                                if (input.getSecond() != null) {
101                                                        if (file.exists(progressMonitor)) {
102                                                                file.setState(merge(context, file, file.getState(progressMonitor), input.getSecond(), progressMonitor), progressMonitor);
103                                                        } else {
104                                                                file.setState(input.getSecond(), progressMonitor);
105                                                        }
106                                                }
107                                                break;
108                                        }                                                       
109                                        }
110                                }
111                        }
112                
113                };
114        }
115
116        @Override
117        public Consumer<BinaryEntityContainer> create(Context iContext) {
118                FunctionFactory<BinaryEntityContainer, BiSupplier<BinaryEntityContainer, InputStream>> contentFunctionFactory = getContentsFactory().asFunctionFactory();
119                return contentFunctionFactory.then(createFileFactory()).create(iContext);
120        }
121        
122        protected InputStream merge(Context context, BinaryEntity entity, InputStream oldContent, InputStream newContent, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
123                File semanticElement = (File) getTarget();
124                EObject semanticMerger = semanticElement.getMerger();
125                Merger merger = semanticMerger == null ? getNativeMerger(context) : Objects.requireNonNull(EObjectAdaptable.adaptTo(semanticMerger, Merger.class));
126                if (merger == null) {                   
127                        throw new ConfigurationException("No merger for reconcile action MERGE", EObjectAdaptable.adaptTo(semanticElement, Marked.class));
128                }
129                return merger.merge(context, entity, oldContent, newContent, progressMonitor);
130        }
131        
132        protected Merger getNativeMerger(Context context) {
133                return null;
134        }       
135        
136}
